title: Skippy the Bush Kangaroo
creator_credit: Max Varnel, Bob Austin, John McCallum, Lee Robinson and Norfolk International Pictures
brief_description: Features two episodes of the television series. “Double trouble” looks at a rival who is trying to take control of the Waratah National Park; “Chicken” is about Skippy being poisoned by a local farmer who holds a grudge against the head ranger.
creator_credit_for_label: Max Varnel, Bob Austin, John McCallum, Lee Robinson and Norfolk International Pictures
